name: St. Andrews Old Course: Eikou No St. Andrews
overview: The Old Course at St Andrews is the oldest golf course in the world. The Old Course is a public course over common land in St Andrews, Fife, Scotland and is held in trust by The St Andrews Links Trust under an act of Parliament. The Royal and Ancient Golf Club of St Andrews (R&A) club house sits adjacent to the first tee and although it might be imagined that they own the course, they are but one of many clubs that have playing privileges on the course, along with the general public. Eikou no St. Andrews is a golf game that features 3D graphics, different golf players to choose (all of them can be customized by the player changing them their stats and heights), 4 courses (one of them is the Old Course at St.Andrews) and different game modes like practice or tournament modes. The game features up to 4 human players to play at the same time, and even a game mode of 2 human players vs 2 computer players.
